## IMock.sendResponse() method

Sends the response back to the client, with the previously specified delay if the payload origin is not `remote`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
sendResponse(): Promise<void>;
```
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;void&gt;
